name: MoviePosterTypes
shortdesc: The type of graphic for the movie poster.

property.name: STANDARD
property.shortdesc: Uses the generic movie poster image file.

property.name: FROM_MOVIE
property.shortdesc: Uses an image from the movie file.

property.name: PROXY_IMAGE
property.shortdesc: (Read-only) Indicates whether the movie poster is not the standard, generic image.
